modals.session_expired_copy: To protect your privacy, we have ended your session.  Please feel free to restart your assessment.
modals.general_problem_headline: There's a problem, please try again.
modals.general_problem_copy: Sorry, we've run into a problem. Feel free to try your assessment again.

product.disclaimer: If you think you have been exposed to a person with known or suspected COVID-19, please consult a licensed healthcare provider for further assessment and visit the CDC for more information. You should NOT use the Fluent Assessment if you are experiencing a medical emergency. In the event of a medical emergency, please call 911.
